mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (writer_id, topic, title, content, wrote_at, view_cnt, like_cnt, comment_cnt) VALUES (#{writerId}, #{topic}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), 0, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT no, writer_id, topic, title, content, wrote_at, view_cnt, like_cnt, comment_cnt FROM article ORDER BY no DESC
SELECT no, writer_id, topic, title, content, wrote_at, view_cnt, like_cnt, comment_cnt FROM article WHERE no = #{no}
